attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the british people have the Democratic right to vote on the most Important Issues in british history/
I.E The current level of borrowing/I.D Cards never in british history including ww11.
And the level of tax that british people will have to pay in the future to pay back this goverments debt.
We as the people should have our voice Now This current government is the most undemocratic in british history.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
